p.a: Frequently asked questions along with information regarding the Family First Coronavirus Relief Act

strong.u: Want to Learn More About Grade Level Expectations? Check out the Standards Family Guides!

span.p: The Kentucky Academic Standards (KAS) Family Guides were developed by the Kentucky Department of Education to help families familiarize themselves with the content of each grade level’s standards. Each grade level guide contains a standards overview for reading and writing, mathematics, science and social studies that includes suggestions for ways you can incorporate learning into your daily activities. Now more than ever, the Standards Family Guides are a great resource to help you meet your child’s learning needs.
Please contact me, your child's teacher or principal if you have any questions.

div.a: Now Accepting Nominations for the 2020 Wall of Fame

span.p: The Williamstown Board of Education is accepting nominations for the 2020 Wall of Fame. This award was created by the Board of Education to recognize Williamstown High School graduates who have made a unique and special contribution to society through their work or other notable activities.
